website_summaries.verdict: A large set of colorful cookie cutters from a known and trusted brand.
pros: Large set of 101 plastic cookie cutters
Has 4th of July, Halloween, Easter, Valentine's Day, and Christmas style cutters
Each style is color-coded for easy organization
cons: Cutters are not very deep, so not ideal for cutting sandwiches

customer_reviews.title: Missing letters
customer_reviews.text: Cookie cutters are nice but the alphabet was missing the e, n and d. Not very useful in spelling my daughter’s name which has an e and an n... or birthday. I freestyled those letters but would be nice if this was a complete set. There were duplicates of a few of the shapes.
customer_reviews.author: Creilly84

customer_reviews.title: Great economical cutters
customer_reviews.text: Big assortment of shapes. They are color coded according to season or occasion. Very easy to find what you are looking for even though there are so many. Green is Christmas, orange is fall, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: never heard any complaints about anything other than how bad salt dough tastes
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for salt dough ornaments. stuck all the kids in the garage while thanksgiving dinner was being cooked, never heard any complaints about anything other than how bad salt dough tastes. haha
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: I love how the different cutters are colored so you know what category they belong to. Red are letters and numbers, shapes are another color, Christmas is a different color and so on. I use these with my PreK class and they have been awesome.
customer_reviews.author: susifab

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.text: 101 cutters. More like 100 and a few broken ones. I ordered and then waited to look and see and now I cannot return. Some of the pieces are really cute, so I am not totally bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Barbaccia

customer_reviews.title: Best Wedding Gift ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite item to give for weddings. It is so fun with so many different uses. Cookies, play dough. I really like the plastic container they can be stored in.
customer_reviews.author: Tana Richards

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pack for my nieces & nephew (ages 3-8) and they are having a blast cutting out cookies! No complaints. Great product, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Green

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: So many different shapes, they are color coordinated by holiday which makes it easier to find what you're looking for. They are plastic so they are not the strongest but they work great, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Green

customer_reviews.title: Great selection of shapes
customer_reviews.text: Great selection of shapes! My daughter loves using them with her Playdoh. My only complaint is that the plastic is pretty fragile and we've already broken one.
customer_reviews.author: M. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: they cut cookies well and have a nice lip o them for picking them up
customer_reviews.author: J. Duider

customer_reviews.title: Complete
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to bake Christmas cookies when she comes home and this set was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth my money
customer_reviews.text: I like that they come in a big container different shapes easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Steelman

customer_reviews.title: I am very satisfied with this item
customer_reviews.text: was as seller described it to be. I am very satisfied with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some cutters came warped from heat
customer_reviews.text: Good for beginner cookie makers! Some of the shapes must have melted because they were a little warped.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, good quality. Huge variety with several shapes for each holiday.
customer_reviews.author: craig barrett

customer_reviews.title: Cut your heart out!
customer_reviews.text: Great cookie cutters! The letters and numbers are a little big. Would have been nice if it had some small rollers.
customer_reviews.author: Kym Benikhis

customer_reviews.title: Sad, angry and frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I'm very sad, angry and frustrated. My product was without lip and it was closed with tape and plastic. It came with only 93 cutters and 3 Christmas cutters are damage. I would like returned product, but I can't. I'm from Costa Rica and shipping return is more expensive that product value.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Cartin

customer_reviews.title: Great cutters
customer_reviews.text: Great variety and color coordinated which is very helpful! My favorites are all included. You will be happy with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Dinah Dickinson

customer_reviews.title: The Grandkids love It
customer_reviews.text: We bought this before the grandkids came to visit. We had lots of fun and have used it each time they visit. It has so many selections for each holiday, event or just spelling a grandchild's name.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin V. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great set, even for kids.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my twelve year old nephew whose very into cooking and baking. The variety is great. Most are medium to large in size with a few minis, which we liked. They were easy to clean after use and we just let them drip dry before storing them in the container they come in.
customer_reviews.author: dpage

customer_reviews.title: 101 cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: Fun for my grandchildren to make cookies or use with play dough. Lots of variety- letters, numbers, animals, holidays
customer_reviews.author: BAC

customer_reviews.title: Lots to choose from
customer_reviews.text: Lots of options to choose from. My kids love to bake cookies and know we have our bases covered for any holiday or occasion you can think of. Shipping took a while, maybe they were sold out due to Christmas time. Didn’t come in time for Christmas but kids still loved them
customer_reviews.author: peggy

customer_reviews.title: Variety!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. What a variety. Even though they are plastic they are pretty durable!
customer_reviews.author: ana felix

customer_reviews.title: plenty of shapes for many occassions
customer_reviews.text: so... many great choices for fun shaped cookies .kids will love to choose!
customer_reviews.author: lorraine gillespie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! So many pieces and reading other ppl tips. It's multiuse other than being cookie cutters.
customer_reviews.author: hmmm

customer_reviews.title: Great Cookie Cutter Set
customer_reviews.text: I have twin 3-year-olds and I bought this for their Mother's Day Out class because they use a lot of Play-Doh. The entire class made me the sweetest thank-you note and all of the kiddos LOVE them. Huge Success!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my childminding business and was very impressed with the different cutters in the collection.
customer_reviews.author: kelly

customer_reviews.title: amazing variety!
customer_reviews.text: The variety of the cutter shapes is awesome. They are even color "coded" by theme - red shapes are alphabet letters and numbers, blue shapes are sports/planes, pink shapes are hearts and flowers, yellow are easter/spring theme shapes, orange are halloween shapes (even a skull and witch shape!), green are Christmas shapes (my daughter loves the reindeer), purple are basic shapes. I'm sure I'm forgetting some. Anyhow, they are great. The only problem I've come across is the depth - my 3 year old likes her sandwiches cut into shapes and these aren't deep enough to cut through 2 slices of bread plus meat and cheese. Perfect for play doh or sugar cookie depths.
customer_reviews.author: CarrieTheGoodTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I received my cookie cutters today and I absolute love it, however the letter "U" is missing.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great for kiddos
customer_reviews.text: Great for kids because you can use the letters to learn spelling or numbers for counting! Awesome variety and fun to decorate! Only con is that they are kind of flimsy since they are plastic and not metal, also I have seen them at Walmart for $10 🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Lesly S.

customer_reviews.title: Good set, but buy somewhere else!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun starter set; my 2 year old and I throw down on some serious cookies and have a blast with all of these. There are small and big and a good variety of shapes and holiday cutters. However, I bought this exact set at WinCo for $8.98 today instead of $23.99 as stated here. So I suggest looking at your local grocery stores before buying here on Amazon, because Amazon is crazy expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Crompton

product_meta.title: Betty Crocker 101 Cookie Cutters, Assorted
product_meta.description: Size:1 PackBetty Crocker has all the cookie cutters you could ever need with their Betty Crocker 101 piece plastic cookie cutter and tub set. All your cookie cutters come in a clear Betty Crocker tub with handle to help with storage and easy carrying. This delightful set features 101 different colorful, kid friendly cookies cutters. Complete Alphabet and numbers, animals, sport, and holidays. Set includes Betty Crocker mix-easy rolled sugar cookie recipe. All Betty Crocker cookie cutters are top rack dishwasher safe.
feature_bullets: Stores neatly in Betty Crocker cookie cutter tub
Complete alphabet and numbers, holiday, animal, and sport shapes
Betty Crocker cookies cutters are top rack dishwasher safe
Cutters come in multiple colors: red, yellow, green, Orange, purple, pink, and blue

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars95 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
